name: Boss Beat
description:
If you're a fan of rhythm games or just love the excitement of battling powerful bosses, "Boss Beat" is the game for you!

*Headphone highly recommanded to enjoy Falcon's freeshly made songs!* Check his soundcloud at: https://soundcloud.com/angelostanca

Well then no more useless reading what are you waiting for? Try now this game!

Only 2 simple inputs : <- and ->

Try not to panic, and share your scores! ;)
